none:
Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on December 19, 2017 Description from Terminal Escape:
Dead Week continues with DEAD MAN. A sinister and somewhat terrifying downtuned attack in four movements. This one is powerful and deliberate, taking abstract metalcore (a la CELESTE) and approaching it with the subtlety of a gas attack. I wish I knew more, but I can only tell you to adjust the volume appropriately, remove sharp object from reach, and strap in.  DEAD MAN
https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-RW2DVOHb5xc/Wjc9o8ObwMI/AAAAAAAASPM/LkEq2ghfiHgUEykYs0mtWZ3D-NY5FtzWACLcBGAs/s1600/Dead%2BMan%2Bcover%2Bcopy.jpg

seo.title: Dead Man - Dead Man demo 2011 - Terminal Escape
